extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

clusters.name: Application Basic
clusters.description: This cluster provides information about a Content App running on a Video Player device which is represented as an endpoint.

attributes.name: VendorName
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify a human readable (displayable) name of the vendor for the Content App.

attributes.name: VendorID
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the vendor ID for the Content App.

attributes.name: ApplicationName
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the name of the application.

attributes.name: ProductID
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the product ID for the Content App.

attributes.name: Application
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the application structure.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the status of the application.

attributes.name: ApplicationVersion
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the version of the application.

attributes.name: AllowedVendorList
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the list of allowed vendors.
